com.jed.actor

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jed.actor.AbstractEntity
      • com.jed.actor.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable, State, Collidable

    public final class Ball
extends AbstractEntity
    Concrete implementation of PhysicsEntity that represents a "Ball" or circle. The circle has a color which is represented as its respective Red, Green, and Blue values.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    jlinde, Peter Colapietro
